participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about her hobbies. She's detail-oriented and enjoys expressing herself through cosplay.
participant_1.background: I need to balance my work and family life. I'm child-free, but I love my niece and nephew. I have been known to fall off my cosplay costume. Grandma makes jewelry. I am in my early 30s and identify as female.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and a bit eccentric. He has a playful side and enjoys sharing his interests with others.
participant_2.background: I was a country singer before I went into business. I am a weirdo. I'm lucky to have such a great dog to share my life with. Pizza is my most favorite thing. I watched a lot of sports last year and kept my home clean and tidy.

content.text: Oh wow, that's a really cool job! I would love to be able to do that.
It is a lot of fun! I love getting to dress up as my favorite characters.
What's your favorite cosplay that you've done?
I think my favorite was when I dressed up as Sailor Moon. I love that show!
That's a great choice! I love Sailor Moon too.
Yeah, it's such a classic. I'm glad that there's still so much love for it today.
Me too! I love that it's still popular with people of all ages.
Yeah, it's definitely a show that can be enjoyed by everyone.
What other cosplays have you done?
I've done a few others, but Sailor Moon is my favorite.
Well, it sounds like you're really good at it!
Thanks! I've been doing it for a few years now, so I've had some time to practice.
It definitely shows! You're really talented.
